alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Knott; Letcher; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:57PM EDT until July 29 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LETCHER...NORTHEASTERN KNOTT...SOUTHEASTERN FLOYD AND SOUTHWESTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ligon, or 11 miles southwest of Pikeville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pikeville, Estill, Elkhorn City, Wheelwright, Pippa Passes, Wayland, East McDowell, Fishtrap Lake, Glo, Garden Village, Beefhide and McDowell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
